Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board -- 6.08 Mills - SB - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(School District)
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  5 year, 6.08 mills property tax renewal for giving additional support to the public schools in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall West Carroll Parish School District of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a six and eight hundredths (6.08) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $306,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public schools in the District?
